response.original_title: Evel Knievel: Last of the Gladiators
response.overview: World-renowned daredevil Robert Craig "Evel" Knievel narrates this fascinating documentary chronicling his remarkable career, which originally began as a hobby to keep him out of trouble. Showcasing some of his most unbelievable stunts -- including his attempt to jump Snake River Canyon and his successful launch over a fountain at Caesar's Palace -- this high-octane film is a testament to Knievel's cockiness and courage.
response.title: Evel Knievel: Last of the Gladiators
